DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of treatment with SYR-472 in diabetic patients.
DOC.criteria: 1. The participant is judged to be capable of understanding and complying with protocol requirements by the investigator or subinvestigator. 2. The participant can sign and date a written, informed consent form prior to the initiation of any study procedures. 1. The participant has concurrent serious cardiac disease, serious cerebrovascular disorder, or serious pancreatic or hematological disease . 2. The participant is assessed to be ineligible for the study by the investigator or subinvestigator.
